title: Interpretation of a dream about eating one’s husband’s head in a dream

preview.html: Interpretation of dreams about eating your husband’s head in a dream When you are looking for an interpretation of a dream about eating your husband’s head in a dream, it is one of the interpretations that some people want to know the meaning of this dream and whether it is a sign of good or evil. The dream and its good interpretation is the jurisprudence of scholars. Interpretation of a dream about eating your husband’s head in Dream: Eating the meat of the husband’s head in a dream may indicate many bad deeds and gossip that the man does, and God knows best. A dream in which he eats the husband’s head in a dream may indicate a lot of money that a woman can gain during this period. It is possible to see yourself eating Your husband’s head in a dream, which indicates many arguments and discussions that occur between them during those days. This dream could indicate big changes in their lives and they must seek help from God. Interpretation of a dream about eating fish with the husband’s family in a dream: Eating fish with one’s family may indicate Your husband in a dream indicates that they are going through a period of small disagreements and that they will end soon. This dream may indicate the suffering that the woman’s family is experiencing during this time and they must seek God’s help. This vision may indicate ease of childbirth if the woman is pregnant or the birth is approaching. It is possible that This dream is an indication of changing events and a wide diet that will happen to them in those days, and God knows best. Interpretation of a dream about a husband smoking a hookah in a dream: In the event that you see a husband smoking a hookah in a dream, this may indicate many serious disagreements between them. It is possible that you will buy if you see A husband eating a hookah in a dream could indicate changes occurring in their lives at that time and they must ask God for help. It is possible that seeing a husband smoking a hookah in a dream indicates a problem with her husband in his workplace, and God knows best. In the event that you see your husband smoking a hookah in a dream, This may indicate that he is going through a financial crisis that he may face for a long time, and God knows best. Interpretation of a dream about my husband asking me to eat in a dream If a woman sees that her husband is asking her for food, this may indicate his need for help during this time. A husband who asks a woman for food may indicate Food in a dream indicates that she is a greedy person who wants to take everything. A dream that a husband asks his wife for food in a dream may indicate financial problems that he may face and that he wants to get rid of in those days. It is possible that seeing a husband asking for food in a dream indicates some variables. What happens to him at this time, and God knows best. Interpretation of my husband’s dream of him giving me food in a dream: Seeing the husband giving food to his wife in a dream may indicate the great goodness that the wife will receive during this period. It is possible that a woman’s dream is for her husband to give her food in a dream. It indicates the comfort that you will gain greatly during this period, thanks to God. Seeing the husband offering food to his wife in a dream may indicate the stability in which they live at this time, and God knows best. If you see the husband offering food to the wife in a dream, this may indicate the end of The dispute and problems that arose between them

title: Interpretation of a dream about a dead person dying and crying over him

preview.html: Therefore, care must be taken to send all personal, social and psychological data to make the correct interpretation, and we will learn about it today together through our website gptafser.com/.Interpretation of seeing a dead person dying and crying over him in a dream for a single girl. She sees in her dream the death of a dead person and the girl is crying over him. A sign that she will marry someone She wants her and loves him, God willing. Likewise, seeing the death of a dead person in a dream indicates the death of things that disturb her comfort, such as judgments and things that get in her way. And God knows best. Crying over her dead father in her dream is not worthy of praise, as it indicates unkind words about her. She must pledge to pray to God a lot so that all evil will be kept away from her. If she sees that her father has died in her dream, this may mean that she will hear good news If an unmarried girl sees that she saw someone die during her sleep, it is a sign that she will be in great trouble if the person dies badly, and God knows best. Death in an unmarried woman’s dream is a sign of changes in her life. It will happen to her and it will turn out for the better, God willing. Seeing a dead person dying in a single woman’s dream is good news for her that she will find someone she loves and get married, God willing. If an unmarried woman hears a dead person dying in her dream, your decisions may be unhealthy and she may regret them. She should be more careful about that and use her mind well. And take the time. Enough to think about not affecting them negatively. If she sees herself not hearing the death screams of a dead person. This indicates that the family of that dead person will communicate with one of their faces, and God knows best. The death of a familiar person in an unmarried woman’s dream indicates that God will prolong her life, God willing. Watch. Also: Interpretation of a dream about the death of a loved one while he is alive. Interpretation of the death of a dead person and crying in a dream for a married woman. When a married woman sees someone close to her dying in a dream, this symbolizes the good news that she will hear, God willing. The previous dream may indicate that he will benefit, God willing. If she sees her father He dies in a dream and she was very sad. It indicates the changes that will happen to her and she will move them for the better, thanks to God. Perhaps the previous dream indicates that the woman will enjoy a long life. Crying over the death of her sister in her dream, symbolizes that the relationship between them is characterized by strength. Interpretation of seeing a dead person dying And crying over him in a man’s dream and its meaning. Perhaps seeing the death of a living father in a dream is an unfavorable vision that symbolizes the difficulties he suffers in supporting him, and God knows best. Read also: Interpretation of a dream about the death of a person and crying over him. Meaning of seeing the death of a dead person and crying over him in a pregnant woman’s dream and interpretation of a dead person’s death in a dream for a pregnant woman Good news for her that God Almighty will remove trials and tribulations. And seeing the death of a familiar person in her dream. Good news for her relates to the baby and its safe arrival, and the happiness she obtains from that child, God willing. A father who dies in a dream for a pregnant woman symbolizes the sorrows and suffering that lives inside her. And she wants Who will stand by her side and help her, and God knows best. Crying over the death of someone who grew up in a dream. Not Mahmoud says that she will undergo a difficult birth and will have to pray a lot to God, but she will be

title: Interpretation of a dream about urinating in the bathroom by Ibn Sirin. Interpretation of a dream about urinating in the bathroom on the floor and interpretation of a dream about urinating in the bathroom.

preview.html: Many believe that the interpretation of a dream about urine in the bathroom has bad omens, but as usual, visions and dreams always carry symbols and evidence that may not occur to the public and need an expert to give a correct opinion or closer to the truth, and this is what we will present to you. Today through the opinions of the great interpreters of visions and dreams.Interpretation of a dream of urine in the bathroom by Ibn SirinInterpretation of a dream of urine in the bathroomWhoever sees in his dream that he is urinating in the toilet, which is of course the most appropriate place for discussion, means that he is a person who can control his emotions and deal with the most difficult situations with great wisdom. A bathroom in a dream for a debtor is good news that the time has come to get rid of the worries and burdens of debt, and he will be able to spend it sooner rather than later. If the dreamer feels at that time that he is burdened with sorrows and has gone through many difficult situations, then seeing himself urinating in the bathroom means that he will approach... Getting rid of all these circumstances and feeling happy and serenity. The mind after going through a difficult time in the past. If someone is sick or his heart has suffered from aches and pains, he continues to pray for healing, and his prayers will be accepted by the Lord of the Worlds, and he will find that healing is his portion. In the shortest time. Interpretation of a dream about urine in the bathroom by Ibn Sirin. Ibn Sirin said: If urine is in its place in the open air, it is good news and a way out of the crises that the dreamer suffered from, and if he finds it polluting the bathroom floor, then it is a well. A sign of his bad behavior and a reckless man who could cause the loss of everyone loyal to him in the world, only to find himself after a short period alone without support or support. A woman was going through a serious psychological crisis, especially if she was divorced, and she saw that she closed the toilet door immediately after she entered to relieve herself. . It is an indication that all things will go in her favor after the divorce and she will get her absolute freedom and material rights, regardless of her superiority from society's point of view and her ability to prove her worth for the better. Because of her good reputation and purity of heart. I still cannot find an explanation for your dream. Search on Google, the Egyptian Dream Interpretation website, which includes thousands of interpretations by leading interpreters. Interpretation of a dream about urinating in the bathroom for a single woman. When an unmarried girl reaches the age of marriage and does not find the most suitable person for her, she sees that she enters the toilet of another house and closes the door in front of him, so she prepares to marry a young man, which is equivalent to compensation. About the past years in which I felt sadness and pain with reckoning and hope from the Lord (Glory be to Him) for comfort. If she urinates in the specified place and empties her bladder completely, then in reality she is going through a state of stress due to the presence of bad friends in her life who are trying to drag her on the path of fun with them, but she is escaping from these and staying away from this path in order to maintain her fame and reputation among the people. It has also been said that her condition is The psychological state in the current and coming period will be calmer and more stable, whether physically or socially. If she wants to work, she will find the right job for her in terms of financial performance and self-realization. Interpretation of dreams of urinating in the bathroom for a single woman. title: Interpretation of seeing a plane in the sky in a dream for different occasions

preview.html: Through this article, we will study for you the interpretation of seeing an airplane in the sky in a dream for different situations. The airplane symbolizes travel, which is a wish that some people desire, whether for work or in search of a decent life, or for tourism, pleasure, and special vacation times. There are other types of these that are used for the purposes of war and bombing. And the destruction of facilities. But in the world of dreams, this vision belongs to ambiguous visions in which the dreamer does not know whether it is a vision that shows good or something bad will happen in his life. Dream interpreters have worked hard to explain the meaning of this dream, which you can see through the encyclopedia.Interpretation of seeing an airplane in the sky in a dreamDream interpreters unanimously agreed that seeing an airplane in a dream represents a change in the dreamer’s circumstances and his going through a new stage in his life, just as if the dreamer was going through With crises in reality, this vision indicates the end of these problems. If the dreamer dreams of a military plane flying in the sky, then this vision indicates that his conditions will become easier in reality. Seeing a plane in a married man’s dream means that you will get a lot of money and have children. Good. If he sees a large plane, this vision indicates that he will obtain a prestigious position, and it is good news for the student to achieve success and academic excellence. As for seeing a small plane in the dream, it means success and success on the professional level. If you see a group of planes flying in the sky, this dream indicates Until what the dreamer desires will be achieved in reality. If the dreamer sees that he is flying a military plane in the sky, then this vision indicates the dreamer’s effort to obey God and stay away from sins and disobedience. As for seeing a plane crash in a dream, this vision is repulsive, and indicates that the dreamer is going through crises. It sums up in family problems, and it also indicates failure to achieve what the dreamer wants. If the dreamer sees the plane taking off, this vision symbolizes the transition to a new stage in his life. But if the dreamer sees the plane burning in a dream, this indicates that he is going through a major financial crisis. In fact.Interpretation of a dream about an airplane in a dream for a single woman. This vision is one of the good visions for an unmarried girl, indicating kindness and abundant living. If she rides, then this dream indicates the approaching date of her marriage. Seeing an airplane in a dream also means getting a job or traveling abroad. If the dreamer sees the plane crashing, then this vision indicates that he is going through an emotional crisis. Interpretation of seeing a plane in a dream for a married woman: Seeing a plane for a married woman is only a sign that she will achieve what she seeks in reality, and if she rides it, this vision shows the stability of marital life and the happiness that she enjoys. With her husband, it also symbolizes her obtaining a lot of money. If a married woman hears the sound of an airplane in a dream, this vision symbolizes liberation from the problems and worries that she suffers from in her life. If she rides an airplane in a dream, this vision foretells the dreamer that she will become Pregnant soon. Interpretation of an airplane in a dream for a pregnant woman

title: Interpretation of a dream about seeing a black wedding dress by Ibn Sirin

preview.html: Interpretation of the dream of seeing the bride’s black dress by Ibn Sirin. It is known in many societies and peoples of the earth that marriage takes place through sexual intercourse between a man and a woman in an official manner, and this is announced by holding wedding ceremonies, so that the bride wears the dress or long white dress while the man wears A black suit, and in some countries there are other parties before the wedding where the bride wears a dress of any color, but what? Interpretation of the dream of seeing a black wedding dress and what are the consequences for a single woman. Interpretation of the dream of seeing a black wedding dress by Ibn SirinThe color black, according to the science of dream interpretation It can be auspicious and can indicate something negative or a disaster entering the life of the fortuneteller due to the association of the color black with sadness when someone has already died, but seeing the bride in black in a dream is against generally accepted morals and customs and that is why we will explain to you the interpretation of the dream of seeing a black wedding dress according to Ibn Sirin: When a woman sees that she is wearing a beautiful black dress in a dream, this vision is very promising for her. While seeing a black dress in a dream for someone who hates the color black, this is a sign that she will fall into crises and bad events and may get into trouble. While seeing a black dress in a dream For a woman who loves the color black, it is considered a harbinger for her to make a lot of profits. In addition, this may be an indication that he will find a good job in the near future. Also, wearing a beautiful black dress in a dream can indicate the revelation of secrets. It may indicate The dreamer is exposed to some psychological problems. In general, seeing black clothes in the dreams of lovers of this color is a harbinger of the fulfillment of dreams and aspirations. See also: Interpretation of the roof of Ibn Sirin or Ibn Shaheen in detail. What is the interpretation of seeing a black dress in a dream... The bride’s black dress? Consequences of any vision It is not the same for all people, because each person has a different interpretation depending on his situation in the dream and in reality, in addition to the viewer’s gender and social status, which is taken into consideration before clarifying the interpretation. In the following lines we explain to you what is the interpretation of seeing a woman wearing a black dress in a dream: Seeing her wearing a black wedding dress in a single woman’s dream is not a good thing. On the contrary, it has many negative connotations. It can indicate the emergence of many problems and crises. And getting rid of her will not be easy. And when you see an unmarried woman wearing a black dress, and she was sad in the dream. The dream showed her marriage to someone she does not love and does not know at all. She may be forced into this marriage. It will only require patience and endurance. See also: Interpretation of dreams To see chickpeas for single and married people according to Ibn Sirin. What is the interpretation of a dream about seeing a black dress in a dream for a single woman? Seeing a black dress does not need a single interpretation due to the multiple occasions on which the dress appears. The dress may be short or long, it may be jeweled or plain, and the girl may have... She or he received it as a gift in a dream. I buy

The dress may be short or long, it may be jeweled or plain, and the girl may have... She or he received it as a gift in a dream. I buy

title: Interpretation of butter in a dream: seeing yellow or white butter in a dream

But the interpretation of foam in a dream: Dreaming about butter in general, whether yellow or white, often indicates money, food, and a lot of spoils, in addition to showing benefit and fulfilling some desires. This is what Imam Ibn Shirin, may God have mercy on him, reported in his interpretation of this vision in detail. Many different cases of seeing butter were mentioned, such as seeing its yellow or white color or seeing the buying or selling of that butter, as each of these cases has special meanings and connotations for that. In this article, we present the interpretation of seeing yellow or white butter in a dream and in a dream according to what was reported by the people of interpretation. Seeing yellow butter in a dream. Most of the commentators who dealt with the interpretation of seeing butter in general and the consequences of seeing yellow butter said that this vision often indicates illness and disease because the color Yellow in a dream is distasteful and indicates illness in whatever condition or form it is in, and it has also been said that seeing yellow butter in a dream may indicate anxiety, anxiety and sadness that befalls the dreamer in reality or his exposure to some dangerous situations. Seeing white butter in a dreamInterpreters reported that seeing butter White in a dream carries more charitable meanings than what was mentioned when seeing yellow butter without a doubt, because the white color is desirable to see in a dream. In addition, for unmarried women, seeing shiny white butter is an indication of the fulfillment of the desires and aspirations that they have long desired. It was also hoped that this dream would be an indication of her marriage to a young man of character and religion. As for a married woman who sees white butter in her dream, her vision indicates On the money, wealth and sustenance that you obtain in real life, and you were born for this longing and you will be in the best condition, God willing. Seeing butter in a dream can indicate money and great wealth that is seized, collected and greatly benefited from in real life. On her stomach. The meaning of eating butter in a dream. Interpreters reported that seeing butter of all kinds in a dream often indicates obtaining a legitimate livelihood, gaining unsuspected money, and benefiting from waking life. It is one of the best and highest-ranking types of butter. Achieving some important things in the dreamer’s life, or fulfilling some desires and satisfying some desires that receive great attention from the dreamer in waking life. As for the sick person who sees in his dream that he is eating butter, this dream indicates salvation from the disease and almost recovery, God willing, according to what Translated by translators. Which makes him lose his vigilance, and God knows best. For an unmarried girl or an unmarried young man, if someone sees that he is eating butter in his dream, then his vision shows his marriage and the nearness of his joy, and it is also a sign of happiness, success, and success. Perhaps the vision indicates that she is pregnant. The pregnant woman...

title: Interpretation of a dream about a black snake

preview.html: Interpretation of a dream about a black snake: Seeing a snake, whether in reality or in a dream, causes dread and fear, especially if it is large or black in color, and the dreamer sees that the snake is attacking him or trying to bite him in order to make him grow bigger. Feelings of dread and anxiety. The man or woman is single, married, or pregnant. We will learn about the interpretation of a dream about a black snake through this article on the site. Different interpretation of seeing a black snake in a dream by Ibn Sirin. Seeing a black snake in a dream indicates a person who has feelings of hatred and hostility towards the dreamer. Seeing a black snake in Water in a dream means getting rid of problems and difficulties and removing sorrows and problems. Seeing a black snake being killed in a dream means that the dreamer will be liberated from the evil and wickedness of those who hate and dislike him. Interpretation of seeing a black snake in a dream by Al-Nabulsi If you see a black snake in a dream, this indicates cruel and powerful enemies and competitors. They have many deceptive and misleading ways. Dreaming of catching a black snake means that the viewer will receive money from his enemies. Seeing the blood of a black snake flowing on the dreamer's hand means that his enemy will die and his property will belong to the dreamer. Killing a black snake in a dream means that the enemies of the visionary will leave the country, and God I know. Interpretation of seeing a black snake in a dream for a single woman. Seeing one black snake in a dream means that she is going through a bad psychological state and feels rejected because of her circumstances and angry towards her life. Seeing one black snake in a dream indicates the presence of an evil and liar in her life or someone who wants to associate with her, and she must be careful. And stay away from it permanently. Interpretation of seeing a black snake in a dream for a pregnant woman: Seeing a pregnant black snake in a dream indicates the presence of someone who makes her angry, hates her, and wants to harm her. Seeing a pregnant black snake in a dream may mean that she will give birth to a boy, and God knows best. Seeing a pregnant woman killed by a snake Black during her sleep indicates that the pain or fatigue she was feeling has disappeared and her pregnancy will be healthy. Seeing a pregnant woman being killed by a black snake in a dream means that she will give birth to a healthy, healthy child safely, easily, and without any problems. Interpretation of seeing a black snake in a dream about the wife: Seeing A married black snake in a dream indicates a woman from her environment who envies her, envies her, and wishes her harm. Seeing a black snake getting married in a dream indicates the bad words said about her by the person who hates her and wants her to wear out among people. Seeing a married black snake biting her in her sleep indicates that she She will be disturbed and anxious and will face many problems. Seeing a married woman being killed by a black snake in her dream indicates the disappearance of the crises she went through and relieves her of any grief or sorrow she feels. Also read: The best time to take vitamins Seeing a black snake in a dream Black hair could be in the dream A symbol of controlling some bad thoughts about the dreamer, which may affect his psychological state for that period. Seeing a black snake also indicates a material loss for the dreamer during the coming period. If a divorced woman sees a black snake in her dream, this means

title: What is the interpretation of seeing a car accident in a dream?

preview.html: Trend website provides you with the complete interpretation of seeing a car accident in a dream. Seeing the accident in a complete dream shows the many problems of life and the tension that the viewer experiences from the pressures of life in reality and many negative dreams and illusions in his life, but it also shows imminent death, God forbid. This vision raises a lot of anxiety, fear, and tension, and we will explain to you, dear followers, the vision of a car falling in a dream for adults, married people, pregnant women, and men, through the books of major scholars. From interpretation and visions. What is Ibn Sirin’s interpretation of a car crashing in a dream? An accident in a dream indicates nightmares in the dreamer’s life, and the rivalries that occur in reality can be interpreted. The great scholar Muhammad bin Shirin says that seeing an accident in a dream fully indicates surprise and changes in The life of the dreamer. Likewise, the appearance of a complete car in a dream indicates many fears, problems, and crises in the life of the fortuneteller and a return to his normal life again. This dream also heralds unpleasant news and portends the news of a person’s death in reality, and God knows best. What is the interpretation of seeing a car? Falling in a dream, complete for an ordinary woman? Seeing a car falling in a dream full of a woman playing bowling while she is inside it indicates that she is completely single and far from God. Alternatively, seeing a car accident in a dream complete, a shameless woman running away from it, foretells her close marriage to Someone you love. Also, seeing a car completely sweep in a dream means an accident or a car colliding with each other. What is the interpretation of seeing a car completely sweep in a dream for a married woman. Seeing a car accident in a married woman’s life indicates betrayal and deception of the husband that she will see. But If a married woman dreams of escaping from an accident in a complete dream, this indicates that she will give birth to a child. Also, seeing a car wash in a married girl’s dream indicates the collapse of all her worries and problems. What is the interpretation of seeing a car falling in a complete dream for a married woman? It generally indicates someone’s deception His family members. What does it mean for a man to see a car completely falling in a dream? If a person dreams of his car falling while he is inside it, this indicates disobedience to God. Instead, seeing him survive the accident shows that all problems have passed and that the man married a good girl. Also, seeing Washing a car in a married man’s dream means that his wife will give birth soon, God willing. If a young man sees that some people dropped his car, this indicates that one of his relatives has been deceived. What is the interpretation of being hit by a car? Death by car in the dreamer’s life indicates the end of his worries and joining a job. New. Likewise, if a person dreams that he ran over someone with his car, this indicates that he has committed sins. When a person sees in his dream a car accompanying him, even a gift indicates his deception. But if he sees that he is avoiding it before the accident occurs, then this indicates success and excellence in life. I dreamed My son was hit by a car. If the girl sees that her father is inspecting the car, this indicates the injustice that she will see. Indeed, colliding with a car with a relative is...

title: Everything you are looking for in the interpretation of a dream about a person in prison

preview.html: Interpretation of a dream about imprisoning someone. Interpretation of a dream about imprisoning someone is one of the dreams that can cause great inconvenience to its owner, especially if this person is a relative or friend and holds a lot of love and appreciation for him. Its interpretations vary according to the social status of the fortuneteller and the details he sees in his dream, and today we learn about everything that follows from that. What scholars say about him. What is the interpretation of a dream about a prisoner? Prison expresses the many pains that the viewer is suffering from and the psychological state he is experiencing at that time. If a young man sees in his dream that he is behind the walls of a dark prison, then he often feels hopeless in his life and does not see a glimmer of light before him. One hope. But in any case, hope will appear before him in the near future, and he only has to make the necessary effort to achieve his goals and leave success to the Creator (Glory be to Him). If the unmarried girl is the one who was in prison and was sad, this is evidence that she is suffering Currently there are problems that are multiplying in the family or family and she can no longer bear being in such an atmosphere that might push her. To marry someone who is not equal to her, to leave the family and try to create a new family for her. As for seeing another person he knows in prison crying, this person is very close to his thinking and is currently going through a major crisis and the visionary needs his support and support, whether through money or psychological support only if Things related to non-financial problems. It has also been said that a patient in prison quickly escapes his illness and enjoys health, well-being, and longevity. If the prison doors are opened, this indicates an improvement in that person’s condition and his release from many of the problems he faced in the recent past. Seeing a prisoner in a dream is It indicates the dreamer's confusion, and his inability to make a correct decision in a very serious matter presented to him, which makes him feel helpless and unsure of himself. It has also been said about imprisoning a person for religious or ideological reasons, that he is faithful to his religion and preserves it, and he may be one of the ascetics in this world who desire In what God has of eternal bliss. Seeing someone imprisoned in a dream by Ibn Sirin When you see in your mind that someone close to you is in prison, he needs you a lot at this time because of the changes that have occurred in his life. There is also a possibility that this person has been forced to Marrying a woman who is not his social or cultural equal and with whom he currently lives miserably and needs someone to give him the necessary advice to deal with his problem. If the brother is the one who saw him in prison, he must rush to contact him immediately, find out what is bothering him and try to help him as much as possible. If you see A person is in prison and does not feel upset or anxious, this indicates that that person will marry if he is still single and because he finds the happiness that he has lacked for years with his life partner. What is the interpretation of a dream about a person being imprisoned? When a girl sees that there is someone she knows in prison and she really wants to get married From him, she often thinks about marrying another person, and she must accept reality and rely on God in all her affairs, and God will guide her to the best. Who. But if she sees that she is in prison, M

title: Interpretation of Mary, peace be upon her, in a dream - seeing Mary in a dream

preview.html: A dream of Mrs. Maryam, peace be upon her, for an unmarried woman, a married woman, a pregnant woman, a divorced woman, Ibn Sirin, and others. Interpretation of Maryam, peace be upon her, in a dream: Whoever sees Maryam bint Imran, he will gain status and prestige among the people and gain all his needs. If a woman sees this dream while she is pregnant, then she has also given birth to a wise son, and if she is slandered, she is innocent of that, and God shows her innocence. If Mary, peace be upon her, sees a pregnant woman, this indicates that she will give birth to a son, and he will be wise, God willing. Interpretation of Mary in a dream By Ibn Sirin, Ibn Sirin says in his famous book (Interpretation of Great Dreams), chapter (Prophets and Messengers): Whoever sees Maryam bint Imran in a dream has great status and prestige among the people. As for a pregnant woman, if she sees in her dream that she is greeting the Virgin Mary, the mother of Christ, or if she sees That she kisses or hugs her, then by the grace of God she can give birth to a fair and just man. Ibn Karim. If the dreamer is not married and sees the Virgin Mary while she is sleeping, if someone curses her while she is awake, then she has been cleansed of slander and God has shown the people her purity. Interpretation of Mary in a dream about phenomena. Ibn Shaheen Al-Zahiri says in his book Al-Isharat fi Ilm Al-Phrases: From He saw in a dream the Virgin Mary, the mother of the Prophet Jesus, peace be upon him. This is a great vision or any of God’s signs. He does not reveal it except to a righteous or chaste servant, or to his tribe or the place in which he is. Interpretation of Saint Mary, peace be upon her, in one dream. Seeing Saint Mary, peace be upon her, in the dream of an unmarried or unmarried girl is considered good news, and in the interpretation it is evidence of the girl’s purity and the purity of her bed. The mother of Christ symbolizes innocence or the appearance of the truth in a dream. Interpretation of the Virgin Mary in a married dream: She is the best of women on the face of the earth. If he sees her married, this is a sign of those with whom the soul rejoices. The mother of Christ visits her, and with God’s help she gives birth to a blessed son. Her livelihood, blessings in her home, peace, security, and prosperity. Interpretation of the Virgin Mary, the mother of the Messenger Jesus, in a pregnant woman’s dream. If a pregnant woman sees the Virgin Mary, this is her interpretation of a blessed pregnancy, God willing, and most interpreters consider that Seeing the Virgin Mary, the mother of Jesus Christ, is a harbinger of the coming of remembrance. The vision also indicates the cessation of the pain and hardships of pregnancy, and in the same context, seeing the Virgin Mary indicates the fulfillment of desires. Interpretation of seeing the Virgin Mary in a man’s dream: If the dreamer is married and sees that the Virgin Mary is visiting him in his sleep, then this is good news, God willing, if he wants food, He will have it in abundance, and if he wants to have children, they will have them. By the grace of God, the Virgin Mary in a married man’s dream symbolizes the sincerity and devotion of his wife to him. If the dreamer is not married, then seeing Maryam bint Imran may warn him of marrying a virgin girl, and his marriage will be, God Almighty willing. Interpretation of Surat Maryam in a dream: Whoever reads Surah Maryam or recites it to him May God relieve his distress, and this is what was narrated by Mrs. Aisha and Imam Jaafar Al-Sadiq, may God be pleased with them both. The Prophet Muhammad and his honorable companions. Whoever saw in his dream

By the grace of God, the Virgin Mary in a married man’s dream symbolizes the sincerity and devotion of his wife to him. If the dreamer is not married, then seeing Maryam bint Imran may warn him of marrying a virgin girl, and his marriage will be, God Almighty willing. Interpretation of Surat Maryam in a dream: Whoever reads Surah Maryam or recites it to him May God relieve his distress, and this is what was narrated by Mrs. Aisha and Imam Jaafar Al-Sadiq, may God be pleased with them both. The Prophet Muhammad and his honorable companions. Whoever saw in his dream
